text: Margot Robbie just topped your epic honeymoon story, thanks to Ellen DeGeneres, Portia de Rossi, former president Barack Obama, and her husband Tom Ackerley's super revealing pair of short shorts. Here's how it all went down. Though she and Ackerley tied the knot in December 2016, the couple didn't embark on their newlywed getaway until after the actress filmed I, Tonya. The pair then jetted off to Tahiti for a joint vacation, which started off with a four - day stay in a secluded part of the island in a hut, sans electricity.
